label: ZMNHJA
info_overview: This Z-Wave module is used to control electric Radiators with 6 different working modes by pilot wire control signal. The module can be controlled either through a Z-Wave network or through the wall switch.
info_inclusion:
• press service button S for more than 2 second or
  • press push button I1 three times within 3s (3 times change switch state within 3 seconds).
info_exclusion:
• press service button S for more than 6 second or
  • press push button I1 five times within 3s ( 5 times change switch state within 3 seconds) in the first 60 seconds after the module is connected to the power supply.
category_description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

options.label: Button does not influence on selected mode
Button does not influence on selected mode
Button does not influence on selected mode

parameters.label: Saving the state after a power failure
parameters.description: Saving the state after a power failure

options.label: The module saves its state before power failure
options.overview: Flush pilot wire module returns to the last position saved before a power failure.

options.label: The module does not save the state
options.overview: After a power failure, Flush pilot wire module returns to "Stop" position.

associations.label: Lifeline
associations.description: Reserved for communication with the main controller

associations.label: Multilevel
associations.description: Triggered at changes of state/value of the Flush pilot wire

associations.label: Basic on/off
associations.description: Triggered at change of the input I1 state and reflecting its state

associations.label: Basic on/off - input I2
associations.description: Triggered at change of the input I2 state and reflecting its state

associations.label: Basic on/off -  input I3
associations.description: Triggered at change of the input I3 state and reflecting its state

commandclass.name: NO_OPERATION
commandclass.label: No Operation - used for PINGing a device.

warnings: Endpoint 0 contains both switch and dimmer channels. It probably should only include dimmer!
